title: Disciplining Your Kids With Love and Limits, Part 1
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: In a conversation centered on their book Put the Disciple Into Discipline, Erin MacPherson and her mother, Ellen Schuknecht, discuss the importance of parents demonstrating love in the midst of disciplining their children. Erin and Ellen also talk about teaching our kids self-control, helping them (and ourselves) become slow to anger, and faith training.
